movies.title: A Haunting in Venice
movies.description: In post-World War II Venice, Poirot, now retired and living in his own exile, reluctantly attends a seance. But when one of the guests is murdered, it is up to the former detective to once again uncover the killer.
movies.stars: Kenneth Branagh, Michelle Yeoh, Jamie Dornan

movies.title: Oppenheimer
movies.description: A dramatization of the life story of J. Robert Oppenheimer, the physicist who had a large hand in the development of the atomic bomb, thus helping end World War 2. We see his life from university days all the way to post-WW2.
movies.stars: Cillian Murphy, Emily Blunt, Matt Damon

movies.title: Wonka
movies.description: Willy Wonka, an aspiring magician, inventor, and chocolatier, arrives in Europe to establish his chocolate shop at the Galeries Gourmet. Burning through his meager savings, he is coerced to stay at Mrs. Scrubitt's boardinghouse.
movies.stars: Timoth√©e Chalamet, Gustave Die, Murray McArthur

movies.title: Barbie
movies.description: Barbie and Ken are having the time of their lives in the colorful and seemingly perfect world of Barbie Land. However, when they get a chance to go to the real world, they soon discover the joys and perils of living among humans.
movies.stars: Margot Robbie, Ryan Gosling, Issa Rae

movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.description: The experiences of a prisoner in the gloomy jailhouse of Shawshank after being found guilty of a crime he did not commit. The film portrays the man's unique way of dealing with his new life.
movies.stars: Tim Robbins, Morgan Freeman, Bob Gunton

movies.title: The Godfather
movies.description: Don Vito Corleone, head of a mafia family, decides to hand over his empire to his youngest son Michael. However, his decision unintentionally puts the lives of his loved ones in grave danger
movies.stars: Marlon Brando, Al Pacino, James Caan

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.description: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.
movies.stars: Christian Bale, Heath Ledger, Aaron Eckhart

movies.title: Schindler's List
movies.description: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.
movies.stars: Liam Neeson, Ralph Fiennes, Ben Kingsley
